channel.title: the pink cow on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in the pink cow on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great time hanging out with Max
item.description: 22:40 Friday 05 July 2019 JST Max and I met at The Pink Cow where Lin and I were going to meet, but she ended up heading home instead after work. After filling up on world famous bean burritos at The Pink Cow, we walked to Roppongi Midtown where we spent a considerable amount of time wondering how to measure if the circular glass window over the white not-really-egg-shaped stone is round or not.
